places_with_reviews.name: Hyatt Regency Kolkata
address: JA-1, JA Block, Sector 3, Bidhannagar, Kolkata, West Bengal 700106, India

reviews.text: 5 stars for wheelchair -accessibility at the entrance as well as inside the premises. Didn't find any ramp leading to the pool area, so have my doubts. Also , the carpet in the doorway was a bit too thick for easy maneuvering of luggage trolley bags as well. Our room had an ironing board but no iron and my friend's room had an iron but no ironing board. Bonus points for really well mannered staff . It was peak season so there was a wait queue for dinner and breakfast seating. Overall, nice ambience.

Me and my husband spent a great time. Room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast buffet was really delicious..we had ordered chicken biriyani from ird, rice was awesome but the chicken was very very hard, chef had served us brownie with icecream from his end which was really a great and yummy..thank you Hyatt and team, keep up the good work.

You know, the Hyatt Regency Kolkata is a real treat! The moment you walk through those doors, you're embraced by elegance and comfort. The rooms? Oh, they're like your own private sanctuary, offering stunning city views and all the comforts you could ask for.
But what really sets this place apart is the people. The staff here? Absolutely top-notch. They go out of their way to make sure your stay is nothing short of amazing. And let's talk about the food! From mouthwatering Indian dishes to international delights, every meal is a flavor explosion.
And don't even get me started on the amenities. The pool? Perfect for a relaxing dip. The fitness center? Well-equipped for a good workout. And the spa? Pure bliss.
Overall, the Hyatt Regency Kolkata is more than just a hotel. It's like a friend who knows exactly how to make your stay unforgettable.

Amazing location,very posh property , huge swimming pool , rooms nicely spacious all perfect but few suggestions .
1) My bed had a very bad iron rod coming beneath..it was the broken spring which would have penetrated through.Anubhav was very kind and he was positive for taking an immediate action.
2) One light button has all light on and off..so if I have to use the washroom at night I need to put on all lights
3) Staff coming to ask if the carpet is new or old ?????
Or if you have laundry ????
No tag on the door for DO Not Distrub or clean my room..
Please make this changes to make an amazing experience.

Breakfast was super good and the staff their all were excellent..

Will surly higly recommended this property

My recent experience at Hyatt Regency Kolkata surpassed all expectations, leaving me thoroughly impressed with both their meeting facilities and accommodations. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a seamless check-in process that set the tone for an exceptional stay.

The meeting facilities at Hyatt Regency Kolkata are truly top-notch. As someone who frequently organizes corporate gatherings, I was thoroughly impressed by the professionalism and efficiency of their event staff. The meeting rooms were spacious, well-equipped with modern amenities, and offered a conducive environment for productive discussions and presentations. The attention to detail and personalized service ensured that every aspect of our meeting was taken care of, allowing us to focus solely on our agenda.

In terms of accommodations, Hyatt Regency Kolkata offers a luxurious and comfortable stay that is second to none. The rooms are elegantly designed, featuring contemporary furnishings and plush bedding that guarantee a restful night's sleep. The impeccable housekeeping service ensured that the rooms were always pristine and well-maintained throughout my stay.

While my experience at Hyatt Regency Kolkata was overwhelmingly positive, I must address the issue of mosquitoes in the area, which proved to be the only dampener during my visit. Although the hotel takes measures to mitigate this inconvenience, such as providing mosquito repellents in the rooms and maintaining the surrounding landscape, it remains an unavoidable aspect of the location's tropical climate. However, I appreciate the hotel's efforts in addressing this issue and ensuring the comfort of their guests to the best of their abilities.

Overall, my stay at Hyatt Regency Kolkata was nothing short of exceptional. The combination of outstanding meeting facilities, luxurious accommodations, and impeccable service truly sets this hotel apart. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a seamless and memorable experience in Kolkata.

places_with_reviews.name: ITC Royal Bengal, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Kolkata
address: 1, JBS Haldane Ave, Tangra, Kolkata, West Bengal 700046, India

reviews.text:
Rooms are, as usual, ITC grand in nature.

1. Service needs to improve. I have to call up twice and wait for 20 minutes for a shaving kit.

2. Check-in took more than 40 minutes, with long queues,  there were empty check-in desks, however no one was present, out of five desks 3 were operational. And no floor manager was available to take quick action.

3. I requested for a pain killer, reception desk diverted me to the bell boy desk, there they told me that they do not have and asked me to call up the reception from the room..I just left the request there.

4. At the breakfast area, I was told to wait,suggesting there were no empty tables,
Later, the desk person vanished, then again  waited for 7 minutes, went inside, and requested a single person occupying a 4 seater table. He was fine sharing the table, had my breakfast.

It's not a great service experience.
.

We went over there for Lunch @Grand Market Pavilion on Bengali New year day . It was total chaos, any food counter you go .... you need luck to get food , Irony was Main course Plate was not there for sometime and people were shouting about that ,  after 2:30 PM desert section nothing was there , mainly cake, ooh forgot to say about desert spoon  🥄 .. nope it was too vanished... Refill of food Nope ! What else I  can say ,it was horrible experience after all. Lesson learned "Don't visit such Hyped place on Big occasion.

Hotel looks great. Room in which I stayed was really big and had all luxury features.
Enjoyed the stay. Food was okay and as expected it was expensive. View from the room was beautiful. One thing is, reception wont tell you the facilities available. You will have to explore on your own. Overall it was a great stay.

It is one of the Luxurious places at Kolkata. I was invited by one of my friends. Here are my thoughts.
1. Ample space.
2. The ambiance was very good.
3. The ala carte option for food was not adequate.
4. Food prices are obviously quite expensive.
5. The staff, service and everything was picture perfect for me.

If you are looking for a luxurious stay, definitely recommend.

We had a great stay in ITC Royal Bengal. We were celebrating a birthday, and special thanks to Richa and the team for for making it extra special. A big shout out to Sourish in the front desk team for indulging us and making our stay extra comfortable. We enjoyed dining at Avartana, the kids loved the pool, and the playroom had them entertained for many hours. The gym is very well equipped and I enjoyed my workouts. A small request is to pay a little more attention to the breakfast buffet. Kolkata has so many culinary delights to offer, however everything we ate at this breakfast left us underwhelmed. Other than this, a fantastic experience, and look forward to staying there again.

places_with_reviews.name: Aquatica Banquet Resort & Water Park
address: Kouchpukur,P.O Hathgachia,P.S. :K.L.C थक्दारी मार्ग, Township, near Rajarhat, Jodthbhim, Newtown, Dhapa Manpur P, West Bengal 700156, India

reviews.text: I would not bother.  The place is in bad repair. It's probably due to covid. The only ride attraction that was working was the children's splash park, but the average age looked closer to 20 than . The wave pool and lazy river did not operate.  The 3 water slides were not operational. One was for a little while.  The place is in extreme need of a makeover. The changing room was bad, and the restroom was worse.  I get it. This is India but I have seen wonderful places in India in my travels.  This was just not one of them. Not worth 700 rupees.  The only positive was that the food was cheap and plentiful.  A bit bland.

Quite safe but you might get stuck inside the covered slides which is pitch dark inside and you can't see a single thing (it's damn scary). And definitely the slides need more maintainance. Food quality was average and the pricing was a bit on the higher side but considering it a water park, it can be excused. The changing rooms and showering rooms are not clean enough. During the waves 🌊 , you'll get to see something worthy and that justifies the money you have paid ( go there and discover) 🤪

please buy your tickets online....on spot, they are way too expensive. Children above the height of of of 4ft needs a full ticket.
In the rooms, every time you order, you need to pay, they dont accept payment at check out.
I had asked for water, I was told to take it on my own from the place where the water is kept in the corridor. The serive was not good at all. Very are very few options for food. But the taste was good.

The toilet was worse than roadside sulabh toilets. We were 8 persons. All of us have the same experience. The authority doesn’t clean toilets. Poop was found even in the showers. There was poop everywhere in the toilets.

It's fun place to enjoy with family and kids. The food they are serving is also tasty and value for money 🤑.
The location and roads improved drastically and become more convenient to reach and they  provide huge free parking space

places_with_reviews.name: The Park Hotel
address: 17, Mother Teresa Sarani, Taltala, Kolkata, West Bengal 700016, India

reviews.text:
The club downstairs plays music till 4am in the morning, on a Monday. I was staying on the 4the floor and couldn't sleep due to the constant thumping music sounds.
Guy at the reception says sir we have a few clubs at the hotel and I've asked them to reduce the volume.
Nothing happened. Eventually moved to a new room.
Letting this review stay here for visibility.

My stay at the Park Hotel was superb. From the warm welcome at reception to the luxurious room and impeccable service, every aspect exceeded expectations. The dining experience was exceptional, offering a diverse menu with exquisite flavors. The hotel's facilities, including the gym and spa, were well-maintained and provided a perfect way to unwind. I highly recommend the Park Hotel for a memorable and indulgent stay.❤️👍🏻

A very very bad experience. Firstly they do not have any facility for wheel chaired guests. One has to bodily lift the wheelchair with the guest to enter the dining arena. The washrooms are also not designed for the same. This was the first hotel / resort in India and abroad we experienced such drawbacks. Secondly there is no doctor on their payroll to attend an emergency call. They provided someone from outside who did not even examine the basics like BP as he had no equipments to do so. But charged ₹2000/- without any bill for consultation.
Great food and great ambience. Very satisfied with the service. My first day brunch experience and loved it. I will definitely come again. Especially the grilled and carving section had my heart.

I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. The rooms are clean, staff very friendly, and the place has several restaurants/bars/clubs/live music, whatever entertainment you are looking for they had it. My only suggestion for improvement would be to not crank up the AC so much, it was extremely cold in many of the areas of the hotel including the lobby.

places_with_reviews.name: Novotel Kolkata - Hotel & Residences
address: Sub-Central Business District(Action Area 1), Action Area 1C, Rajarhat, New Town, Kolkata, West Bengal 700156, India

reviews.text: Breakfast and Dinner were good and had variety of dishes. As a family we needed rooms together (better interconnected) but we were given rooms that were far away from each other. Rooms looked like of old ages. Exhaust fan of 1 of the washroom was not working despite of complaint it was not resolved. Otherwise it was a good stay at Novotel.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at your establishment and wanted to share my overall positive experience. The staff was courteous, and the ambiance was delightful. However, I would like to offer a suggestion to enhance the guest experience further.

The rooms were comfortable, but a slight improvement in certain aspects could elevate the stay. Additionally, expanding the breakfast options a bit could add more variety for guests.

Despite these minor points, I genuinely enjoyed my time at your hotel and appreciate the warm hospitality. I believe these adjustments would contribute to an even more exceptional stay for future guests.

Great hotel at the right location. Highest ratings goes for the staff service for their hospitality. Room and bathroom very clean Special recognition to staff kankana very helpful. Food was great specially breakfast options are exciting. I will visit again for the hospitality from staff I received.

It was wonderful stay here in Novotel Kolkata. Hotel's crew were there to help at all stages. Such a kind and polite behaviour from all the staff. Cleanliness and Hygiene maintained. Breakfast buffet was awesome. Enjoyed a lot with my Colleagues.

Novotel has a fantastic location. The best part that we loved is that they have staff from different zone which  helps in the upliftment of the society as a whole. This touched our heart. Thanks to all of you at Novotel for a warm stay.

places_with_reviews.name: JW Marriott Hotel Kolkata
address: 4A, JBS Haldane Ave, Tangra, Kolkata, West Bengal 700105, India

reviews.text:
The hotel's ambiance is a perfect blend of modern luxury and classic charm. The lobby is tastefully decorated, with plush furniture and an inviting atmosphere. The attention to detail in the interior design creates a sense of comfort and sophistication.

My room was nothing short of spectacular. The attention to cleanliness was evident, and the room was well-appointed with all the amenities one could ask for. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep. The room's design showcased a thoughtful mix of contemporary style and practical functionality.

JW Marriott hotels are known for their luxury and comfort, and my experience at one did not disappoint. From the moment I entered the lobby, I was greeted by a sense of elegance and hospitality. The rooms were spacious and well-appointed, with modern amenities and comfortable bedding.

The dining options were outstanding, offering a range of culinary experiences to suit different tastes. The staff was attentive and courteous, always ready to assist with any request.

One of the standout features was the spa and wellness facilities, which provided a perfect opportunity for relaxation and rejuvenation. The hotel's location was convenient, often situated in prime locations within cities.

Overall, my stay at a JW Marriott hotel was a luxurious and enjoyable experience, making it a great choice for travelers looking for a high-end hotel experience.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at JW Marriott Hotel, and it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The luxurious ambiance, impeccable service, and attention to detail truly set this hotel apart. The rooms were spacious, elegantly furnished, and provided breathtaking views of the city. The staff went above and beyond to ensure a comfortable stay, catering to every need with a warm and friendly demeanor. The culinary offerings were outstanding, with a diverse range of delicious options that satisfied even the most discerning palate. The hotel's central location made it convenient for exploring the city's attractions. Overall, JW Marriott Hotel exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend it for a remarkable and indulgent stay. Five stars without a doubt! 👏🏼🌟

Very quite and The Architecture
The Services,Complimentary Breakfast & Welcome Snacks,Hotel Amenities. Room & Its Amenities
High-Level Security
Abiding Secrecy
Immaculate Surroundings are so wonderful.
And the most glamorous hospitality locations in the world due to the level of service they provide.

The attention to detail in every aspect of my stay was truly impressive. The elegant decor and comfortable accommodations created a memorable experience. The staff's hospitality was exceptional, making me feel truly pampered throughout my visit. I highly recommend this hotel for a top-notch and indulgent stay.

places_with_reviews.name: The Westin Kolkata Rajarhat
address: Plot No. Cbd/2 Action Area - Ii, New Town, CDB(AA-II), Rajarhat, New Town, West Bengal 700156, India

reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Westin for a weekend getaway, and I must say, it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted by the warm and welcoming staff, who ensured a smooth check-in process.

The room itself was a haven of comfort and elegance. The bed was luxuriously plush, providing a restful night's sleep after a long day of exploring the nearby attractions. The attention to detail in the room decor did not go unnoticed, with thoughtful touches that added to the overall ambiance.

One of the highlights of my stay was the impeccable service provided by the staff. Whether it was arranging transportation, recommending local restaurants, or attending to any requests I had, they were always courteous, professional, and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was nothing short of perfect.

The hotel's amenities were also top-notch. I particularly enjoyed unwinding in the spa after a day of sightseeing, where I indulged in a rejuvenating massage that left me feeling refreshed and revitalized. Additionally, the on-site restaurant offered a delightful culinary experience, with a diverse menu showcasing the finest local ingredients.

The location of the hotel was another standout feature. Situated in the heart of the city, it was within walking distance of numerous attractions like Ecopark, making it the perfect base for exploring everything the area has to offer.

The ambience is amazing but the chefs need to follow more food safe guidelines like wearing gloves while preparing food and also keeping in mind the shelf life of food products. Otherwise it was a great experience..

This place is amazing with beautiful structure and view from the hotel. The view of the two towers connecting with a swimming pool on the 3rd floor looks stunning. The restaurant ambience is quite good and it is located on the 10th floor. Mostly people prefer a buffet as it serves a variety of dishes which is good as per price. You can hangout with family and friends and have a pleasant stay.

Loved the ambience. It is a nice place to stay with lovely view. I stayed with my family for 4 days and we had a wonderful experience. The food was tasty and staff was very friendly.  Infact my room view was close to swimming pool and i enjoyed sitting beside the window. it was great experience. Must visit the restaurant

Smooth check in. Excellent amenities placed in the room. Wonderful views from the room windows. Ms. Vineeta is a very good hostess. Warm and kind. Loved her smile. The Executive Lounge has nice decor and wonderful people. Service has improved a lot. Food was delicious and the ambience of the restaurant was nice. All the staff at the restaurant were always on their toes.

places_with_reviews.name: Taj Bengal, Kolkata
address: 34-B, Belvedere Rd, Alipore, Kolkata, West Bengal 700027, India

reviews.text: It was such grand infra with unique luxury comfort for their clients. Staff is amazingly cooperative. Such lavish lavatories, you will feel like that washrooms are better conference rooms, ha ha! But seriously I fell in love with the massive lounge areas surround with trees and highly appreciated handicrafts.

The place is so good in customer care. Every one in hotel can go to any extent possible to help you. I guess that's what Taj is known of. I have such a nice experience in cafe Cal 27 and especially thanks to Mr Vijay for such a nice hospitality. I wish him very best.

Extravaganza at its best. Been on a conference so limited time spent. Overall its a classic heritage location. Ambiance, reception, food, beverage, the interiors all resemble a separate class of its own. A truly great experience. Always recommended.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Taj Bengal in Kolkata, and it was an unforgettable experience. The hotel truly lives up to its reputation for luxury and impeccable service. My room was not only spacious but also elegantly furnished, providing a comfortable and relaxing retreat.

The dining options at Taj Bengal are exceptional. I indulged in a variety of cuisines, from traditional Indian dishes to international favorites, and each meal was a delight for my taste buds. The attention to detail and quality of service at the restaurants were impressive.

One of the highlights of my stay was the hotel's facilities. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to stick to my workout routine, and the spa treatments were incredibly rejuvenating. I also enjoyed relaxing by the beautiful swimming pool area.

The hotel's location is another advantage, with easy access to popular attractions in Kolkata. Whether I wanted to explore the vibrant markets or immerse myself in the city's rich cultural heritage, everything was within reach from Taj Bengal.

Overall, my stay at Taj Bengal was exceptional, thanks to the luxurious accommodations, delectable dining options, and top-notch amenities. It's definitely a place I would recommend to anyone visiting Kolkata.

Stayed here for a day on a business trip! The lobby was beautifully lit for the holiday season and had a Christmas feel all around. The reception staff were warm and welcoming. Overall a very good stay.
A major shout out to Mr. Vijay from the restaurant for his amazing hospitality and kindness. Always smiling and ready to help. Please convey my regards to him.

places_with_reviews.name: Vedic Village Spa Resort
address: Shikharpur P.O, Bagu, Newtown, Sikharpur, West Bengal 700135, India

reviews.text: The resort covers a large area. The resort is located outside of the city limits, thus it is free of all noise. The food was too delicious. There were many options to explore, such as sightseeing and play areas. It was a pleasant experience to be there.

The location and ambience of the resort is nice and calming. Far from city noise you can look out for a tranquil getaway for a weekend. Food is good too. The resort although lack in hospitality service. Also I was allocated room after 3pm although checkin time is 2pm. I arrived early so had to wait long to get the room which was not good in my experience.

The entire resort is situated covering a huge area. The resort has varieties of Rooms (Villas),  we stayed where we had a private pool on the terrace. The place is definitely very peaceful, the other guests were sophisticated, good crowd. The service was really nice, room dining foods were Okay type (need improvements), but the breakfast buffet was amazing. Private vehicles/ Cabs are must  to reach the location. Overall it was a good stay.

This is a beautiful, idyllic and serene place to spend a few days in peace. Overall, it is not a place for people seeking luxury but for those who seek a calm and relaxed escape from the buzz of cities and high end properties in the middle of one.

The staff is very cordial and responsive. Nothing to deduct even half a mark for.  They only lose one star for the uniformity of experience across the tiers of rooms. Maybe I am hard to please but that's what makes me a proud critic.

The location is inside the vedic Village and little far from the city hence location wise it's a little difficult as cabs also charge huge amounts. But the resort itself is beautiful.. superb greenery around and superb weather. The rooms are nice and spacious. The service is really good. But the food is okay.. limited vegetarian options. Travel can be difficult as public transport is bad. But if you decide to stay in the resort itself then a great plan.

places_with_reviews.name: Fairfield by Marriott Kolkata
address: Cb 218, CB Block(Newtown), Action Area 1C, Newtown, Kolkata, New Town, West Bengal 700156, India

reviews.text:
Been there on a few occasions. My stay was great.

Well maintained property. Great room service. Every employee is very helpful.

The quality and the taste of Food and Drinks is awesome.

Shopping Malls is just beside.
Apart from this Eco Park, the Wax Museum is very close.

Highly Recommended.

Stayed at Marriott for 2 days and the experience was amazing ..Rooms were clean and so were bathrooms We got connected room  one with queen bed and other with twin bed.Both the rooms had amazing view..Behavior of the staffs were really amazing . Breakfast exceeded the expectation , taste was amazing .. Overall experience was top notch ..Loved staying at the hotel . Surely recommend it to family and friends and will come back .

If you are looking for great service and ambience then you are in the right place. This hotel offers you a good view, good location, and the good food . Yes the rooms are small but service and staff here make you forget about this little thing.Mr Abhi Mukherjee , I appreciate your excellent service and thank you for making my stay enjoyable.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Fairfield by Marriott. Despite having an early morning flight, the experience was peaceful and delightful. Vertex bar stands out for its incredible cocktails and top-notch food. There is another restaurant called Kava, which i haven't tried but the vibe is perfect there. The only area for improvement is the check-in process, which felt slightly unprofessional. Overall, if you're seeking a comfortable stay with fantastic food, I highly recommend Fairfield by Marriott.

Quite new hotel in Kolkata New City. Dinner and breakfast were better than expected. Price is reasonable. Good service for the airport pickup but a bit slow to find a room ready at 9 AM despite the fact I had booked both a day use from 9 am and then then room for the full night. Once they sorted it out all went well.
